name: Introduction to C Programming
details: C is a general-purpose, procedural programming language developed in the early 1970s at Bell Labs by Dennis Ritchie. It is one of the most influential programming languages.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Introduction to Algorithms is considered a fundamental and comprehensive resource for learning about algorithms and their applications.It provides various algorithmic techniques.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: The course aims to introduce students to the C++ programming language and how it can be applied in the field of Data Structures and Algorithms.

name: Basic Data Structures
details: Basic data structures are fundamental building blocks in computer science and programming. It contains such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs, and hash table.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
details: (OOP) in Python is a fundamental topic in Python programming. Python is a multi-paradigm programming language, and OOP is one of its primary paradigms.

name: Software Engineering
details: Software engineering is a multidisciplinary field that focuses on the design, development, testing, maintenance, and management of software systems.

name: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a leading cloud computing platform and a subsidiary of Amazon.com. It offers a wide range of cloud computing services in IT infrastructure.

name: Database (MySQL)
details: MySQL is a widely used relational database management system (RDBMS) that is open-source and known for its speed, reliability, and ease of use.

name: Problem-Solving Part
details: Problem-solving is a critical aspect of many fields, including mathematics, computer science, engineering, business, and everyday life. It refers to the process of finding solutions.
